abstracts.cdata!:
The Sub-National Government Public
            Sector Modernization Program Project for Argentina aims at
            improving the capabilities of the provincial governments and
            their municipalities to more effectively manage their
            resources and improve the quality of government
            administrative services. The changes to the project include:
            (a) one year extension of the closing date from March 31,
            2012 to March 31, 2013; and (b) a change in some project
            development objective (PDO) and intermediate indicators.
            This will be the second extension for the loan's
            closing date and will result in a cumulative extension of
            2.5years. The PDO remains unchanged and likelihood of
            achieving it will increase with the changes.
